thread.title: ezAccounting 2015 Software Has Updated Tax Form Controls For Small Business Owners
thread.title_full: ezAccounting 2015 Software Has Updated Tax Form Controls For Small Business Owners

author: Tammie Bernard
title: ezAccounting 2015 Software Has Updated Tax Form Controls For Small Business Owners
text:
ezAccounting business software from Halfpricesoft.com now offers more controls in printing tax forms. Also, business owners can now export vendors, employees, and contractors to ezW2 software to print & e file 1099 and W2 easily. The cost and quality of this business application are why companies are switching once they download and test it. “ezAccounting business software now allows customers to export vendors, employees, and contractors to ezW2 software to print & e file 1099 and W2 easily.” said Dr. Ge, the founder of halfpricesoft.com.
EzAccounting software is designed to help small businesses take control of business finance. The software’s graphical interface leads users step-by-step through setting up company, add customers, handle orders, accept payments and handle employee payroll tasks. New user can download and try this software for free with no obligation and no cost at http://www.halfpricesoft.com/accounting/accounting-software-download.asp
ezAccounting is the right in house accounting solution for small businesses to track income and expense, process payroll, print checks, generate reports and print tax forms. The main features include:
Company Management Features
Unlimited company account
Customize form format
Customize check format
Support multiple tax code
Support multiple payment term
Support flexible document serial number
Customer/Sales Features
Input Estimates, Invoices, Payments, Refunds and non-invoice purchases
Print invoice, receipt in paper or PDF format
Multiple tax rate
Product management
Customer management
Vendor/Purchase Features
Input bill and pay bill
Manage Vendors
Priced at $149, (Limited time offer of $119.00 for 2015 version) ezAccounting software is affordable for any size business. Customers seeking a way to simplify business operations are welcome to start the no obligation 30-day test drive today at: http://www.halfpricesoft.com/accounting/accounting-software.asp
About Halfpricesoft.com
Founded in 2003, Halfpricesoft.com has established itself as a leader in meeting and exceeding the software requirements of small businesses around the world. Offering payroll software, employee attendance tracking software, check writing/printing software, W2 software, 1099 software and ezACH deposit software. It continues to grow in the philosophy that small business owners deserve affordable, user friendly, and totally risk-free software.
